```{r}
library(AnnoRE)
snp <- "rs3736485"

gwa_stats <- read.csv(paste("../inst/data/", snp, ".gwa.csv", sep = ""))
anno_df <-read.table(paste("../inst/data/",snp,".loc.annot.txt",sep=""),header=T,as.is=T,sep="\t")
ldsc <- read.table("../inst/data/BMI_baseline_1kg.results",header=T, as.is=T, sep="\t")

locus_summary <- annotateREvariance(gwas_locus = gwa_stats, annotation = anno_df, h2partition = ldsc)
```

```{r}
fine_mapping <- REestimate(loc_summary_df = locus_summary, trait_h2 = 0.13, 
                           loc_ld_matrix = NULL, 
                           loc_ld_file = "../inst/data/rs3736485.1000G.loc.hap.ld")
head(fine_mapping)
```
